ðŸ“– Summary: EasyNotes is a cross-platform note application that supports Windows, Android, and iOS. It offers P2P and web server synchronization, allowing users to keep their notes consistent across devices. The application supports multiple languages and includes features like a dark theme and tablet optimization.
